page.title: 05GAMES AT HOME AND SCHOOL
page.content: {Hot Chocolate You can have as many players as you like.You sort out who will be 'on it' and then he goes to the opposite side of the playground.Then he turns his back to the other players and they have to get to the other side while the person who is 'on it' has his back to them.The person who is 'on it' is allowed to keep turning around as long as there is a space of about 2 seconds between them.If he sees anybody move they have to stand in a row next to him with there arms stretched out.Also their fingers have to be touching.The people who have been caught can get free if someone touches them and says {'Hot Chocolate'}and they all run to the other end of the playground.If the person who is 'on it' tigs someone who is running to the other end,that person is 'on it'.Continued on page 6.
